section.para: Purging Count Tags deletes the Count Tags from your system, freeing up disk storage space. To purge Count Tags from the system once they have been posted, select the "Purge Posted Count Tags" option. The following screen will appear:
When purging posted Count Tags, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: All posted Count Tags up to and including this date will be purged.
Select to purge posted Count Tags for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse where posted Count Tags are to be purged.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without purging posted Count Tags, returning you to the application desktop.
Purges posted Count Tags from the system.
